column1: 25976,Mighty Avengers (2007) #32,32,48662,32,"""The Coming Darkness..."" The throwdown you've been waiting for-- and that Loki, God of Mischief-- has been scheming towards: THE MIGHTY AVENGERS versus THE DARK AVENGERS! Hank Pym's team has tried their best to be a shining light in the world of Dark Reign but this might be the time that light gets snuffed out!  Special appearance by the MIGHTY THOR! Rated A ...$3.99",
